类的使用
org.wso2.balana.finder.PolicyFinder

  • 使用PolicyFinder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.wso2.balana
    This is the root package, which contains the PDP class where most people will want to start.
    org.wso2.balana.finder
    The finder package supports all of the pieces of the XACML specification that require custom implementation.
    org.wso2.balana.finder.impl
    The few included finder modules are provided in this package.

    • org.wso2.balana中PolicyFinder的使用

      返回PolicyFinder的org.wso2.balana中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PolicyFinder PDPConfig.getPolicyFinder()
      Returns the PolicyFinder that was configured, or null if none was configured
      参数类型为PolicyFinder的org.wso2.balana中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static PolicyReference PolicyReference.getInstance(Node root, PolicyFinder finder)
      已过时。 
      As of 2.0 you should avoid using this method and should instead use the version that takes a PolicyMetaData instance. This method will only work for XACML 1.x policies.
      static PolicySet PolicySet.getInstance(Node root, PolicyFinder finder)
      Creates an instance of a PolicySet object based on a DOM node.
      static PolicyReference PolicyReference.getInstance(Node root, PolicyFinder finder, PolicyMetaData metaData)
      Creates an instance of a PolicyReference object based on a DOM node.
      参数类型为PolicyFinder的org.wso2.balana中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PDPConfig(AttributeFinder attributeFinder, PolicyFinder policyFinder, ResourceFinder resourceFinder)
      Constructor that creates a PDPConfig from components.
      PDPConfig(AttributeFinder attributeFinder, PolicyFinder policyFinder, ResourceFinder resourceFinder, boolean multipleRequestHandle)
      Constructor that creates a PDPConfig from components.
      PolicyReference(URI reference, int policyType, PolicyFinder finder, PolicyMetaData parentMetaData)
      Creates a new PolicyReference instance.
      PolicyReference(URI reference, int policyType, VersionConstraints constraints, PolicyFinder finder, PolicyMetaData parentMetaData)
      Creates a new PolicyReference instance with version constraints.

    • org.wso2.balana.finder中PolicyFinder的使用

      参数类型为PolicyFinder的org.wso2.balana.finder中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract void PolicyFinderModule.init(PolicyFinder finder)
      Initializes this module for use by the given finder.

    • org.wso2.balana.finder.impl中PolicyFinder的使用

      参数类型为PolicyFinder的org.wso2.balana.finder.impl中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void FileBasedPolicyFinderModule.init(PolicyFinder finder) 
      protected Element FileBasedPolicyFinderModule.loadPolicy(String policyFile, PolicyFinder finder)
      Private helper that tries to load the given file-based policy, and returns null if any error occurs.
